parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. By default, pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**. Maximum value: **100**.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the application. After an application is created, it enters the **Normal** state. Valid values:

*   **Normal**
*   **Disable**
